name: Kiera Manion-Fischer
body:
Your content is as important as your code.

I write compelling, error-free, well-researched articles, website copy, newsletters and press releases that showcase anything you can build.

Did I mention I thrive on deadline?

[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kieramanion)
